Overrule.definition: to rule against [the objection was overruled ] compare sustain 2 a

1.definition: to rule against [the objection was] compare

2 a.definition: to rule against upon review by virtue of a higher authority[the appeals courtthe trial court's decision]

sub_terms.b: to set aside as a precedent or guide [did not intend toprior jurisprudence in that area] [refused tothe landmark case] compare
